output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, it includes "CMF: 11240002" which indicates this is electoral propaganda.
2. Refers to candidates: - Mentions "Simion" (George-Nicolae Simion) and "Ciolacu" (Ion-Marcel Ciolacu) by surname - Indirectly references PSD, AUR, and PNL candidates
3. Addresses wide population: - Clearly addresses the general public ("soarta României este în mâinile tale") - Large reach (100,000-124,999 impressions) - Significant spend (900-999 RON)
4. Electoral objective: - Directly calls for voting action ("ieși la vot") - Makes electoral claims about other parties/candidates - Uses electoral messaging ("singurul partid care poate garanta...") - References the election date ("Pe 1 decembrie")
5. Journalism: This is not journalistic content but clear campaign messaging
6. Personal opinion: This is not a personal opinion but an official party communication with CMF number
The post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7) and is specifically targeting the presidential election on December 1st.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Makes direct electoral appeals - Targets specific candidates and parties - Calls for specific voting action - Uses campaign messaging - Has significant paid reach
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL Galati, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea si promovarea unei reclame pe Facebook (ID: 539157538894856) care constituie propaganda electorala activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea contine un numar CMF (11240002), face apel direct la vot ("ieși la vot"), ataca direct contracandidatii (Simion si Ciolacu) si promoveaza pozitia PNL pentru alegerile prezidentiale, folosind mesaje precum "singurul partid care poate garanta un viitor european". Postarea are un impact semnificativ, fiind promovata cu un buget intre 900-999 RON si atingand intre 100.000-124.999 impresii, reprezentand astfel o incercare clara de a influenta votul pentru alegerile prezidentiale din 1 decembrie 2024.
